subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Wes Welker -- first doubted, then redeemed -- took an up-and-down ride from Oklahoma to Lubbock, Tex., and eventually the Super Bowl as a key part of the Patriots’ offense.
snippet: Wes Welker -- first doubted, then redeemed -- took an up-and-down ride from Oklahoma to Lubbock, Tex., and eventually the Super Bowl as a key part of the Patriots’ offense.
